channel.title: Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jia-Xin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

I am a 3rd year master student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. Currently, I am advised by Prof. Ruixuan Wang, Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang at iSEE-SYSU. I received my B.Sc. Degree from Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University in 07/2018. I was a research intern of Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab, advised by Prof. Liang Lin.

New!!: I am looking for Ph.D position ! !

Research Interest

  • Self-supervised Learning
  • Data imbalance in Medical Image Analysis

Publications

  1. Jiaxin Zhuang, Jiaxin Cai, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    Deep kNN for Medical Image ClassiÔ¨Åcation.
    MICCAI , 2020, Lima, Peru. [PDF] [bib]

  2. Weipeng Li*, Jiaxin Zhuang*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Wei-Shi Zheng.
    Fusing Metadata and Dermoscopy Images for Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    ISBI, 2020, Iowa, USA. [PDF] [code] [bib]

  3. Jiaxin Zhuang*, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng.
    CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data.
    MIDL, 2019, London. [openreview] [code] [bib] [poster] [slides] [zhihu]

  4. Zili Xu, Jiaxin Zhuang, Rong Zhang, Ruixuan Wang, Xuemei Guo and Wei-Shi Zheng.
    Auxiliary Decoder and Classifier for Imbalanced Skin Disease Diagnosis.
    AICS, 2020, Hangzhou, China. [PDF]

  5. Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Siyamalan*, Ruixuan Wang , JianGuo Zhang, Jihan Liu, Jiahui Pan, Ziyu Yin.
    Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection Using Deep Neural Network Ensemble.
    MICCAIW , Granada, Spain, 2018. [PDF], [Code]

Research Experience

  • Tencent Youtu AI Lab (Oct 2020 – June 2021). Research Intern on Self-suspervision and Model Architecture Design. Advisor: Dr. Sun Xing

Awards

  • Rank3 (out of 77 teams). MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018. Note: top 2 teams used additional public dataset to train models.
  • Excellent Students in iSEE Lab. Sun Yat-sen University, 2019-2020.

Services

  • Reviewer of ACM-MM2021, MICCAI2021

  • Review paper of ICIG2019, IScIDE2019

Interest

  • Photography
  • Comics, such as One Piece.

Recent Coauthors
